all_in_one_solution: Your all-in-one solution for intra-state bus journeys!
vroomio_description: Vroomio is a powerful and easy-to-use mobile app designed to simplify and improve your within-the-state bus travel experience. Whether you're commuting for work, heading to college, visiting family, or planning a short getaway, Vroomio helps you find and book the best bus options â€“ all in one place.
daily_to_weekend: From daily travel to weekend getaways, Vroomio makes state-wide travel simple and stress-free.

check_bookings: Check your upcoming and past trips
